meaning_str.bing:
n. 停止；阻止；车站；停留
v. 停止；阻止；停下；防止
网络. 停止播放；停车；停车站

停止；阻止；使结束；结束；使停下；停下；暂停；中断；使中断；停止工作；停止运转；逗留；待；堵塞；止付；停付
停止；阻止；终止；中止；暂停；停靠站；车站；站点；逗留；停留；（照相机的）光圈；（管乐器的）调音塞；（管风琴的）音栓；音管；塞音；塞子；阻挡物；制动器

1.en: And so far, not even the combined official powers of the Fed and Treasury have been able to stop the cascading disasters.
1.cn: 到目前为止，即便美联储和财政部的权力合为一体，也无力阻止层层叠叠的灾难发生。

2.en: I remember Cult turning his head a quarter hearing my cry for help but in the stress we all were in no one had the time to stop.
2.cn: 我记得邪教在谈到他的头四分之一听我的呼救声，但在强调我们都是在没有人的时候停止。

3.en: Then the old security lady yelled for me to stop. She told me my books were on the top of my car but one had already fallen off.
3.cn: 守停车场的大妈喊我停车，说我把书放在了车顶上，有一本已经掉了。

0.en: Okay! Okay! Stop it, you! You stop it!
0.cn: 好了！好啦！停止，你们！ 你们停止！

1.en: You're just gonna have to stop pissing me off.
1.cn: 只是你现在必须停止惹怒我。

2.en: And Monica ask me to make the drumming stop. Done.
2.cn: 莫妮卡要我停止鼓声。好了。

3.en: An emergency injunction against the museum to stop the exhibition.
3.cn: 申请对博物馆的紧急禁令使其停止展览。

4.cn: 停止所有引擎的运转。遵命。

5.en: Stop it, Sheldon. Do I say "stop what?" or just throw in the towel?
5.cn: 少来了，谢尔顿。我是接“少来什么”还是该停止装傻了？

6.en: When you told me to stop looking for Shaw, I did.
6.cn: 你让我停止找肖的时候，我照办了。

7.en: I want them to stop listening to my wife's law office.
7.cn: 我要他们停止监听我妻子的律所。

8.en: Did the nightmares ever stop? Yeah. When I met your mother.
8.cn: 这种噩梦停止过吗？有，我遇见你妈妈的时候。

9.en: We're not Microsoft or Dell. So we need to stop trying to be that.
9.cn: 我们不是微软或者戴尔，我们必须停止效仿他们

10.en: In the meantime, however, the investigation will not stop until we find Margot.
10.cn: 同时，调查不会停止直到我们找到玛戈。

11.en: No, my point is I want them to stop listening to me and my office.
11.cn: 不，我的意思是我要他们停止监听我及我的办公室。

12.en: Aren't you going to swallow that? Just waiting for it to stop bubbling. Yeah, isn't that great?
12.cn: 你不吞下去吗？我只是在等泡泡停止。是不是很棒？

13.en: Chandler, you're home! That's right! Your husband's home! So now the sex can stop!
13.cn: 钱德，你回来了！没错！你老公回来了！ 所以现在性爱派对可以停止了！

14.en: Okay, you are gonna have to understand it. You're with a guy who's not gonna stop planning his future with you.
14.cn: 你必须理解，跟你在一起的人不会停止去计划他跟你的未来。

15.en: Today the whole world stop working when there was a powercut and all the electricity was lost.
15.cn: 今天整个世界都停止了运转，当供电中断的时候，所有的电都消失了。

16.en: Blackbeard won't stop searching for Peter. There's only one place on this island he wouldn't dare look.
16.cn: 黑胡子不会停止寻找彼得的，这个岛上只有一个地方他不敢去查。

17.en: Now, GHB gives the user a feeling of euphoria, but take it in combination with alcohol and you stop breathing.
17.cn: G水能够让服用者极度兴奋，但与酒精混合，会让人停止呼吸。

18.en: The cynical side of me thinks that it benefits you if I stop my fundraising right when I'm hitting my stride.
18.cn: 从世俗的角度，我认为这对你有利，如果我刚步入正轨就停止筹款。

19.en: Rach, come on, Emma's fine. You're turning into an obsessive mother, okay? You need to stop.
19.cn: 瑞秋，别这样，艾玛没事的。你已经变成过份关心的母亲了，你要停止这样。
